text: Debbie Rush (born Debra Ann Smith; 29 March 1966) is an English actress. She is best known for portraying the role of Anna Windass in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street (2008â€“2018). Rush has also made appearances in various British television series, including Hollyoaks: In the City, The Street, Shameless, Brassic and Inside No. 9. ==Other websites== * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:Actors from Greater Manchester Category:People from Rochdale
title: Debbie Rush
